string.Text: Closed captions. Press the spacebar to toggle captions on and off.
Skip navigation. Press enter to return to the slide.

links.slidetitle: 1. The operating cycle in a company usually dictates the purpose of the loan, amount and repayment terms.
links.displaytext: 1. The operating cycle in a company usually dictates the purpose of the loan, amount and repayment terms.

links.slidetitle: 2. In a commercial lending situation the loan proceeds and purpose may be diverted to other needs including using the funds to purchase  other companies.
links.displaytext: 2. In a commercial lending situation the loan proceeds and purpose may be diverted to other needs including using the funds to purchase  other companies.

links.slidetitle: 3. In small business lending the borrower will be active in the negotiation of interest rate on the loans, terms, collateral, guaranties, and loan agreement stipulations.
links.displaytext: 3. In small business lending the borrower will be active in the negotiation of interest rate on the loans, terms, collateral, guaranties, and loan agreement stipulations.

links.slidetitle: 4. Commercial loans are usually divided into two (2) main categories: loans to finance current/trading assets and term loans to finance fixed assets.
links.displaytext: 4. Commercial loans are usually divided into two (2) main categories: loans to finance current/trading assets and term loans to finance fixed assets.

links.slidetitle:
5. Loans to finance fixed assets are considered short term debt on 
the balance sheet.
links.displaytext:
5. Loans to finance fixed assets are considered short term debt on 
the balance sheet.

links.slidetitle:
6. The main purpose of loan documentation is to have a written, 
legally enforceable understanding of the obligations of both parties: 
the bank and the borrower.
links.displaytext:
6. The main purpose of loan documentation is to have a written, 
legally enforceable understanding of the obligations of both parties: 
the bank and the borrower.

links.slidetitle: 7. Proper corporate documentation in file must attest the individuals who are authorized to act on behalf of the company. As a result a bank will need written proof of authority to borrow.
links.displaytext: 7. Proper corporate documentation in file must attest the individuals who are authorized to act on behalf of the company. As a result a bank will need written proof of authority to borrow.

links.slidetitle:
8. In a credit transaction there are two (2) basic forms of agreement 
between a bank and a customer: the loan agreement and the security agreement.
links.displaytext:
8. In a credit transaction there are two (2) basic forms of agreement 
between a bank and a customer: the loan agreement and the security agreement.

links.slidetitle:
9. Term loans and revolving credit agreements usually require
 loan agreements.
links.displaytext:
9. Term loans and revolving credit agreements usually require
 loan agreements.

links.slidetitle: 10. A loan agreement usually is comprised of five (5) major sections.
links.displaytext: 10. A loan agreement usually is comprised of five (5) major sections.
